name: New Dawn: Aether Hearts
description:
Civilization peaked, resources start dwindling, and factions start investing in super weapons, mechs of the last age to vie for supremacy and lead humanity into a new dawn.

Set in an alternate earth, humanity discovered “aether hearts” objects of nearly unlimited energy. With this newfound resource technology, humanity progressed exponentially, colonizing the stars and spreading out far and wide. However, one day, something in the universe shifted and the “aether hearts” faltered, now a shadow of its former self, human civilization having grown dependent on the resource collapsed overnight. 

However, humanity ever resilient managed to rise back from the ashes, although far from the former heights from before the fall, the various factions that arose from the crumbling empire have found unique ideologies and technology to fight for supremacy.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

New Dawn: Aether Hearts is an intricate top-down RTS-style multiplayer game where players must capture various objective points across the map to earn resources. As a part of the mech genre this game boasts many different units to choose from so the player must determine what the best use of their resources is.
